thumb.title: BLOOD CREST/Fryingpan 【HXVOC】
thumb.description: ボカデス2025 投稿曲デスボって言う人は信用しない(話を合わせる場合は除く)music/lyric/mix by Fryingpan ( https://twitter.com/pan_of_the_fry )【lyrics】What's wrong with wanting?What's wrong with desiring? What's wrong with wishing and seeking?A heavy sacrifice made to obtain the power of the divinemore bloodmore soul Satanic ritualAn unfathomable amount of blood was spilledconspiracy Genocide Civil warUpon the engraving of the crest of blood, an entire kingdom falls in a single nightI cross a river of blood, Raise a mountain of the deadchaos insanityDespair descendsAn unstoppable world in disarrayconspiracyHellfire Eternal SilenceUpon the engraving of the crest of blood, an entire kingdom falls in a single night
thumb.last_res_body: この展開のセンス... いいねぇ うぽつです💕 888888888 カコイイ うぽつです 安心安定クオリテ... 8888888 ギターかっこいい！ カッコイイ！ すいません 言います うぽつです！💜...
